Package report

Class HistogramReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.HistogramReportController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class HistogramReportController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class displays the complaints or income histogram report after receiving the data from the ReportController.
